txt.en: Bósi reports that a relic of Gorothúl's lies among the Water-wheels of Nalâ-dûm and will require careful usage of the mechanisms to reach and destroy.
A wave of dread passes through you as the relic is destroyed, then is gone.
Destroy the relic of Gorothúl in Nalâ-dûm
Bróin believes that one of the relics Gorothúl left behind in Moria was given to the merrevail infesting the Mirror-halls of Lumul-nar and wants you to destroy it.
Defeat Caerlûg, the foul creature that has taken residence in the depths of the Water-wheels of Nalâ-dûm.
